content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ give your coffee cup a taste of sweater weather with the **wheat stitch™ pumpkin cup cozy** this festive cozy is the perfect quick project for fall and makes a wonderful gift for pumpkin spice lovers teachers friends or anyone who deserves a little handmade happiness this pumpkin has options keep it classic with one cozy orange color or mix it up with two tones for extra texture you ll start by crocheting the body in ** my signature wheat stitch 1 ** for a knit-look finish then add a join-as-you-go ribbed green top optional but oh-so-cute next stitch on a pair of simple crochet leaves and finish it all off with a rustic twine bow easy fun and full of fall vibes **bonus** colorwork version included in the full pdf perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike this cozy works up quickly and is a great stash-buster this pattern comes with a video tutorial 2 **crochet hook ** g+/7 4 5mm - or size to meet gauge 3 **notions ** removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 string for tags 7 **yarn ** herrschners worsted 8 8 100% acrylic 489yds/226g shown in clay & leaf you can also purchase smaller quantities of some colors herrschners worsted 3 9 - 100% acrylic 183yds/85g **yarn quantities ** orange 50 60 yds green 10 yds **yarn substitutions ** brava worsted 10 - 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g herrschners village cotton 11 - 60% cotton/40% acrylic blend 207yds/100g red heart super saver flecks 12 - 96% acrylic/4% other fibers 236yds/141g mary maxim maximum value 13 - 474yds/227g **abbreviations ** blo- back loop only chain - chain flo - front loop only rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ws - wrong side **gauge ** not critical for this pattern not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 14 **sizes ** short tall **skill level ** advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 15 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 16 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 17 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 18 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 19 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 20 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express
